Package kodkod.engine.fol2sat

Provides a facade for translating, evaluating, and approximating Kodkod formulas, expressions, and int expressions with respect to a given Bounds (or Instance) and Options.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RecordFilter
    A filter for TranslationRecords, based on the value of a record's node and literal fields.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SymmetryDetector
    Partitions a universe into equivalence classes based on the bounding constraints given by a Bounds object.
    Translation
    Stores the translation of a Kodkod problem to CNF.
    Translation.Incremental
    An incremental translation preserves the internal data structures used during translation.
    Translation.Whole
    A whole translation stores the complete CNF of encoding of a given problem.
    TranslationLog
    A log of the translations of the descendants of a given formula that are either formulas or that desugar to formulas.
    TranslationRecord
    Record of a translation event.
    Translator
    Translates, evaluates, and approximates nodes with respect to given bounds (or instances) and Options.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    HigherOrderDeclException
    Thrown when a node contains a higher order declaration that cannot be skolemized, or it can be skolemized but skolemization is disabled.
    UnboundLeafException
    Thrown when a node contains an undeclared variable or a relation with no bounds.

Package kodkod.engine.fol2sat Description

Provides a facade for translating, evaluating, and approximating Kodkod formulas, expressions, and int expressions with respect to a given Bounds (or Instance) and Options.

Package Specification

Provides a facade for translating, evaluating, and approximating Kodkod formulas, expressions, and int expressions with respect to given Bounds (or Instance) and Options. The Translator class contains methods for translating a Kodkod formula to CNF, evaluating a Node with respect to an instance, and over-approximating the value of an expression based on the upper bounds in a given Bounds object.

Related Documentation

See Also:
Translator, Translation, TranslationLog, TranslationRecord
